title: Software Developer
subtitle: July 4, 2022 to August 16, 2022
description: I worked as a Flutter Developer for two months, contributing to the development of an e-commerce app called Relay. During this time, I gained hands-on experience in building cross-platform features and optimizing the app for better user performance.

title: Annotation Specialist
subtitle: September 15, 2023 to September 9, 2024
description: Worked as an Annotation Specialist for 1 year on Remotasks and Outlier, focusing on image, video, and sensor fusion projects. Contributed to high-quality data annotation and preparation, ensuring accuracy for AI and machine learning training.

title: Upgrade & Repair Basics
subtitle: 2020 – Present
description: I have practical hands-on experience with hardware upgrades and basic repairs, primarily focused on maintaining and fixing my own devices. This experience has strengthened my troubleshooting skills and ability to improve system performance.

title: Web Developer
subtitle: 2021 – Present
description: I have hands-on experience in web design and development, creating responsive layouts and functional websites from mockups. My focus is on building and implementing practical designs rather than animated UI/UX prototypes.
